title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again
description: When importing a new image into the layout again, the image is not being refreshed. The original image remains displayed instead of the newly imported one.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the original image continues to be displayed instead of the newly imported one.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the newly imported image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
1. Open the layout where the image is displayed.
2. Import a new image (e.g., 'image1.jpg') into the layout again.
3. Check if the newly imported image is displayed. The original image should not be visible.
